definitions.title: v.b.
definitions.body: pay reverence to, serve (deity) (cf. As. palâḫu, fear, revere (and Bh [[יׇרֵא]], [[פָּחַד]] etc.); Eg. Aram. [[פלח]] worship Lzb:351; Targum [[פְּלַח]] serve, Syr. plah.; Palm. [[פלחא]] soldier);—

pay reverence to deity (usu. [[ל]] acc.): impf. 3 mpl. [[יִפְלְחין]] Da 3:28, Da 7:14, Da 7:27; so Pt. act. [[פָּלַח]] Da 6:17, Da 6:21, pl. [[פָּֽלְחִין]] Da 3:12, Da 3:14, Da 3:18, and (acc. dei) v:Da 3:17.
pl. cstr. as n. [[פָּֽלְחֵי בֵית אֱלָהָא]] Ezr 7:24 servants of the house of God ( + priests, Nethinim, etc.).
